verses.roman:
paugaṇḍa vayase līlā bahuta prakāra
vṛndāvana-dāsa ihā kariyāchena vistāra

synonyms: paugaṇḍa vayase—in His early age; līlā—pastimes; bahuta prakāra—of various kinds; vṛndāvana-dāsa—Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura; ihā—this; kariyāchena—has done; vistāra—the elaborate explanation.
translation: The Lord performed many varieties of pastimes in His early age, and Śrīla Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura has described them elaborately.
